languages.text: "Тогда, Трона ради, перестань озадачивать меня подобными заявлениями". {n}Голос Хейнрикса звучит то ли устало, то ли насмешливо.{/n}
"Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тогда, Трона ради, перестань озадачивать меня подобными заявлениями". {n}Голос Хейнрикса звучит то ли устало, то ли насмешливо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，看在黄金王座的份上，以后别再说这种话了。这种话实在是很令人不安。”{n}海因里希的语气既像是愤怒，又像是挖苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，看在黄金王座的份上，以后别再说这种话了。这种话实在是很令人不安。”{n}海因里希的语气既像是愤怒，又像是挖苦。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}

languages.text: «Entonces, por el Trono, deje de hacer esas declaraciones. Son desconcertantes». {n}Heinrix usa un tono que podría ser de exasperación o sarcasmo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, por el Trono, deje de hacer esas declaraciones. Son desconcertantes». {n}Heinrix usa un tono que podría ser de exasperación o sarcasmo.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「では、王座のために、このような声明を出すのはやめていただきたい」{n}ハインリックスは苛立ったような、あるいは無愛想ともとれるような口調で告げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「では、王座のために、このような声明を出すのはやめていただきたい」{n}ハインリックスは苛立ったような、あるいは無愛想ともとれるような口調で告げた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Beim Thron, dann unterlasst diese Verkündigungen. Es ist äußerst verstörend"{n}, sagt Heinrix in einem Ton, der als verärgert oder als sardonisch gedeutet werden könnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beim Thron, dann unterlasst diese Verkündigungen. Es ist äußerst verstörend"{n}, sagt Heinrix in einem Ton, der als verärgert oder als sardonisch gedeutet werden könnte.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, pour l'amour du Trône, veuillez cesser de faire de telles déclarations. C'est perturbant, » {n}ajoute Heinrix sur un ton aussi exaspéré que sardonique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Alors, pour l'amour du Trône, veuillez cesser de faire de telles déclarations. C'est perturbant, » {n}ajoute Heinrix sur un ton aussi exaspéré que sardonique.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "O zaman Taht aşkına böyle şeyler söyleme artık. Sinirlerim bozuluyor." {n}Heinrix, bunu küçümseyici ve azarlar bir tonla söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then, for Throne's sake, stop making these pronouncements. It's quite unnerving," {n}Heinrix says in a tone that could be exasperated or sardonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "O zaman Taht aşkına böyle şeyler söyleme artık. Sinirlerim bozuluyor." {n}Heinrix, bunu küçümseyici ve azarlar bir tonda söylüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
